name: Summer and Virtue
description:
Play as either a cute glasses wearing Nun or a Deus Vult guy in Armor and help out the local pastor with some issues in Hub Town. This game takes place in the summer even though no NPC actually references it. The game is 3d first person, features a Hub Town, and 7 quests to be completed. Some fights are optional depending on your actions. Skills can be customized using slotted equipment. Can customize your party. 

Note: It is best to move using WASD rather than the mouse as the mouse can cause the game to lag.
